name: Granny
description: You have to escape Granny`s house...You have five days...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 64bit Processor: Intel Core TM i5 750 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Sapphire Radeon HD 5770 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
